鑗鑗鑗

鑗字的基本解释

鑗
lí
金属。
剥。
古代釜一类的器物。

鑗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lí］
［《廣韻》力脂切，平脂，來。］
亦作“鋫1”。亦作“錅1”。
(1)金属之一种。黑金。
(2)同“藜”。

鑗字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鑗； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1325第23
【廣韻】郞兮切【集韻】憐題切，?音黎。【說文】金屬。一曰剝也。　又【廣韻】力脂切【集韻】良脂切，?音棃。義同。　亦作鋫。

鑗字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鑗字的起名意思

暂无。

Qi
Basic explanation of words
Qi
lí
metal.
peel.
Utensils such as ancient kettles.
Qi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lí]
["Guangyun" Lizhi cut, flat fat, come. ]
Also known as "鋫1". Also known as "錅1".
(1) A kind of metal. black gold.
(2) Same as "quinoa".
Qi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鑗; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1325 Page 23
[Guang Yun] Yin Xi cut [Ji Yun] pity the question,? Yin Li. [Said the text] Metal. One said peeling.　[Guangyun] Lizhi cut [Jiyun] Liangzhi cut,? Yindi. The same meaning.　 also for 鋫.
Qi
